Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter_etudiant.coordinator.interfaces

Interface CoreCoordinatorServicesI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreCoordinatorServicesConnector, CoreCoordinatorServicesInboundPort, CoreCoordinatorServicesOutboundPort
    public interface CoreCoordinatorServicesI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    L'interface CoreCoordinatorServicesI définie les services offerts par le composant CoreCoordinator.

    Description

    Permet de préallouer un coeur d'un ordinateur

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : February 1, 2019

    Author:
    Chao LIN
